Title: Developer Greetings
Description: Hello, I am the creator of the game.

Title: Developer’s Coffee Break
Description: The developer hasn’t coded your next choice yet. Please wait while they grab another coffee.

Title: Artificial Inspiration
Description: All sprites in this game were generated using AI.

Title: Accident due to low energy
Description: You had an accident due to low energy

Title: Final Diagnosis
Description: Your body couldn’t take it anymore. Illness overwhelmed you, and your story ends here.

Title: Unemployed
Description: Without work or direction, you fell into hardship. Survival became impossible.

Title: Broken Dreams
Description: You gave up on all ambitions. Without goals, life itself lost its drive.

Title: Final Breath
Description: Your body couldn’t endure the weight of your choices. Life quietly fades away

Title: Alone in the Crowd
Description: No friends, no family, no one left to hear your voice. Loneliness becomes your only companion.

Title: Faded Joy
Description: All your ambitions dissolved into emptiness. With no spark left to chase, even waking up feels meaningless.

Title: Morning Run
Description: A friend invites you to go for a morning run. Do you accept?

Title: Overtime
Description: Your boss asks you to stay late to finish a project.

Title: Weekend Trip
Description: Your friends are going on a spontaneous weekend trip.

Title: Family Dinner
Description: Your parents invite you for a family dinner.

Title: Extreme Sports
Description: An opportunity for bungee jumping arises. Do you take it?

Title: Gym Membership
Description: A new gym has opened near your house. Will you join?

Title: Scholarship Offer
Description: You received a competitive scholarship for a tough computer science program. It’s a great career step, but the workload will be heavy.

Title: Local Job Opportunity
Description: A nearby studio offers a junior position with flexible hours. It’s practical but growth might be slower.
LeftAnswer: Take the job and start now
RightAnswer: Keep searching for a better offer

Title: The Meaninglessness of Life
Description: The days seem meaningless, you don't enjoy anything

Title: Illegal Agreement
Description: An illegal job offer has arrived. It could be very lucrative.

Title: Social Destruction
Description: You got into an irreversible argument with your closest group of friends

Title: Heart Attack
Description: Suddenly your chest feels tight and you can't breathe

Title: Doctor Checkup
Description: You feel chest pain — do you go for a checkup?

Title: Energy Drinks
Description: Energy drinks keep you awake, but at a cost.

Title: Diet Plan
Description: Doctor suggests a strict diet. Do you follow it?

Title: Sleep Schedule
Description: Your sleep schedule is slipping. Will you fix it?

Title: Free Screening
Description: A free health screening is offered nearby. Do you attend?

Title: Yoga Class
Description: A new yoga class is available in your area. Do you join?

Title: Junk Food
Description: Fast food is on discount today. Do you grab some?

Title: Marathon
Description: A local marathon invites participants. Do you run?

Title: Meditation
Description: A mindfulness retreat opens nearby. Do you attend?

Title: Join the Basketball Team
Description: Joining the new basketball team may improve health and popularity but cut study time.

Title: First Apartment
Description: You found a small apartment downtown.

Title: Midnight Snack
Description: At midnight, you crave pizza from the fridge, knowing it’s unhealthy but tempting.

Title: Credit Card Offer
Description: A bank offers you a credit card with rewards, but debt may build up fast.

Title: Student Loan
Description: College is expensive, so the bank offers a student loan.

Title: Mortgage
Description: Your dream house comes with a big mortgage commitment.

Title: Election Day
Description: You’re at the polling station and must decide where to cast your vote.

Title: Florida Man Strikes Again
Description: A half-naked guy offers you a pet alligator. He swears it’s “totally safe.”

Title: Karen Strikes
Description: A Karen screams to see the manager as you shop for cereal.

Title: Awkward Dinner
Description: Your uncle starts a political rant at Thanksgiving. Everyone stares at you.

Title: Mall Santa Job
Description: A mall offers you a job as the shopping center Santa.

Title: UFO Sighting
Description: Locals swear they saw a UFO hovering over a cornfield. You’re nearby.

Title: Haunted Motel
Description: A cheap roadside motel has “one room left.” Locals whisper it’s haunted.

Title: Conspiracy Theories
Description: A coworker insists the moon landing was fake.

Title: Hot Dog Eating Contest
Description: The county fair is hosting a hot dog eating contest.

Title: Cowboy Festival
Description: A town festival lets visitors ride mechanical bulls for free

Title: Gun Show Raffle
Description: Your neighbor invites you to a raffle where the prize is… a shotgun

Title: 4th of July Chaos
Description: A guy tries to light fireworks with a cigarette. Everyone is cheering.

Title: Desert Road Trip
Description: Your friends propose a spontaneous road trip through the Nevada desert -no maps, no plan.

Title: Surf’s Up
Description: A surfer buddy calls: “The waves are perfect!”

Title: Ski Weekend
Description: Friends invite you skiing in the Rockies.

Title: Ivy League Party
Description: A Yale student invites you to a campus party.

Title: Super Bowl Party
Description: Your neighbors invite you to watch the Super Bowl.

Title: Black Friday Chaos
Description: Walmart opens at 4 AM. You see a 50% off TV ad.

Title: Welcome to Ohio
Description: You wake up and your neighbor’s trampoline is flying across the sky again.

Title: Creature in the Cornfield
Description: You see something glowing in the cornfield at night. It’s moving closer.

Title: It Was Just Carl
Description: Turns out, it wasn’t an alien or a monster. It was your neighbor Carl wearing a headlamp, looking for his lost lawnmower.

Title: Cornfield Chase
Description: You run into the cornfield with your phone flashlight. The glowing thing starts moving faster toward you. It’s… a raccoon wearing a glow stick.

Title: Bear in the Driveway
Description: You open your garage and there’s a bear sitting on your snowmobile.
RightAnswer: Try to scare it with the car horn.

Title: The Heat Wave
Description: It’s 112°F outside. Your neighbor is baking cookies on his car hood again.

Title: The HOA Showdown
Description: Your neighbor’s mailbox is painted the wrong shade of beige. The HOA demands action.

Title: Deer Season Diplomacy
Description: Your neighbor accuses you of scaring off his deer. He’s been tracking them all year.

Title: Small Town Hero
Description: You rescued a kitten from a storm drain. The mayor gives you a medal at the diner.

Title: The Backyard Project
Description: You decide to build a shed “without instructions.” Three neighbors join uninvited.
RightAnswer: Tell them to watch from the fence

Title: Gas Price Philosophy
Description: Gas hits $5 a gallon. Your friend says “it’s for the planet.”
RightAnswer: Remind him he drives a truck too

Title: Blank Card
Description: This card was supposed to be something, but no one remembers what.

Title: Social Media vs The Stock Market
Description: People online say they’re “taking down Wall Street” by buying random stocks.
Artwork: Social Media vs The Stock Market_0
LeftAnswer: Buy one share for the memes.

Title: AI Writes Your Essay
Description: A new app promises it can “write anything for you.”
LeftAnswer: Use it for your college paper.

Title: Streaming Subscription Overload
Description: You have seven subscriptions and nothing to watch.

Title: Email Server Crash
Description: A government office loses thousands of emails overnight.

Title: Bureaucracy 101
Description: You need a form to get a form that lets you apply for another form.
RightAnswer: Fill them all; accept your fate.

Title: Government Shutdown (Again)
Description: The government shuts down. National parks close, but your bills don’t.
RightAnswer: Start your own tiny government at home.

Title: Printer Jam Again
Description: You hit 'print' 12 times. Now the printer is spewing paper like a volcano.

Title: Office Birthday Cake
Description: You don’t even know whose birthday it is, but cake is cake.

Title: Video Call Chaos
Description: Half the team is on mute, the other half is frozen.

Title: Unexpected Market Crash
Description: Your portfolio looks like a ski slope

Title: Crypto Coworker
Description: Your coworker won’t stop talking about a new coin called 'BananaToken.'
LeftAnswer: Invest a little, just in case.

Title: Wokeflix Originals
Description: A superhero show where the real villain is... traditional values.
LeftAnswer: I just wanna watch something fun
RightAnswer: I miss when heroes fought crime

Title: Pronoun Policy at Work
Description: HR requires everyone to list pronouns on their badges.

Title: Grandpa's Winchester
Description: An old family rifle is found in the attic with a faded note.

Title: Second Amendment Right
Description: A debate starts at the diner about constitutional rights.

Title: Freedom Blenders Commercial
Description: A screaming salesman yells from your TV: 'The Freedom Blender! Crush ice and communism!'
LeftAnswer: Crush a few reds for breakfast
RightAnswer: Crush a few reds for breakfast

Title: Late Again
Description: Traffic again. Boss is waiting. Coffee... or consequences?

Title: Freedom Above All
Description: A protester waves a flag shouting: 'Don’t tread on me!'

Title: Red or Blue?
Description: Your family dinner turns into a political battlefield after someone mentions gas prices.

Title: News War
Description: Two TVs at the gym: one blasting Falcon News, the other ANN (American News Network). Everyone’s pretending not to watch.

Title: Meme Diplomacy
Description: The Vice President posts a meme mocking himself.

Title: Error 420
Description: Too many crypto bros trying to apply for a job at MoBurger’s. The site is temporarily unavailable.

Title: Patriot Alert
Description: After a drone delivery lands in your yard, two ICE agents show up asking if you’ve seen 'foreign technology'

Title: Meme War Heats Up
Description: President posts a meme mocking Governor — the internet erupts.

Title: Family Therapy Coupon
Description: Your spouse found a “Buy 1 Get 1 Free” therapy coupon online.

Title: Coffee Thief
Description: Someone keeps stealing your labeled coffee mug

Title: Mandatory Fun Day
Description: The boss declares a team-building day… at a paintball park.
LeftAnswer: Go all-in and lead the team

Title: Office Romance
Description: Two coworkers start dating. Productivity drops.

Title: Tipping Debate
Description: Barista glares at you.

Title: Halloween Costume
Description: You dress up as a politician

Title: Writing Memoir
Description: You feel nostalgic.

Title: Writing Memoir
Description: You feel nostalgic.

Title: Electric Car Charger
Description: The charger costs more than gas this month.

Title: Conspiracy Uncle
Description: He sends you a 9-minute “documentary.”

Title: Parking Ticket
Description: You got one minute after meter expired.

Title: Movie Award Night
Description: The wrong movie wins again.

Title: IRS Letter
Description: We need clarification…

Title: The Phone Update
Description: Your phone updates overnight. It looks exactly the same, but slower.

Title: Side Hustle Era
Description: Everyone’s doing a side hustle: Etsy, dropshipping, delivery… your feed won’t stop.

Title: A Persistent Cough
Description: You've had a dry cough for weeks. Your insurance has a $500 deductible for specialist visits. Do you ignore it and hope it goes away, or pay up to see a doctor?

Title: Civic Duty Calls
Description: You got a summons for Jury Duty. It pays $15 a day. You have a huge project due at work. Do you try to act 'crazy' to get dismissed?

Title: Scalding Coffee
Description: You spilled a 'Mega-Heat' coffee from 'Big-Burger' on your lap. The warning label was slightly blurry. Should you sue for $2 million?

Title: Mandatory Sensitivity Seminar
Description: HR has scheduled a 4-hour mandatory seminar on 'Micro-Aggressions in the Workplace.' You find the material absurd and a waste of productive time. Do you sit quietly and nod, or speak your mind about it?

Title: The Lemonade Stand Raid
Description: Your daughter is selling lemonade on the sidewalk. A city inspector arrives and demands to see a 'Commercial Food License' and a health certificate. Do you tell him to leave your property?

Title: Independence Day
Description: Your town banned fireworks because they "scare the local squirrels."

Title: The Noise Complaint
Description: Your neighbor is playing loud "Yacht Rock" at 2 AM on a Tuesday.

Title: The Subscription
Description: A streaming service removed a classic movie because it’s "problematic" by today's standards.

Title: The AI Replacement
Description: Your company introduced an AI that does 80% of your job. Your boss calls it "Efficiency."

Title: The Infinite Loop
Description: A politician on TV claims that taxing you more and doubling the minimum wage will somehow make your $7 eggs cheaper. Do you buy into this "New Math"?

Title: Freedom Air Pest Control
Description:
Farmers in Texas complain about feral hogs destroying land.
A private company offers helicopter-based “pest control” — and civilians can join after a short safety course.
You sign the waiver without reading it.

Title: Garage Startup
Description:
You have a startup idea.
It starts in a messy garage with cheap laptops, empty coffee cups, and big dreams.
Do you clean the garage and get to work?

Title: Monster Truck Rally
Description: Grave Digger vs. Megalodon! Mud flying, engines roaring, beer flowing.

Title: Anti-Tax Protest
Description: Government taking too much! Join the protest with Gadsden flags or pay taxes like a sheep?

Title: Lost Wallet
Description: You find a wallet on a lonely road. No ID, just a few bills inside.

Title: Gas Station Stop
Description: You stop for gas. The cashier watches you a little too long.
LeftAnswer: Ask if anyone lost a wallet.

Title: Strange Man
Description: A man approaches, calm but intense. He asks if you found something on the road.
LeftAnswer: Talk to him about the wallet.

Title: Motel Night
Description: You rent a small room. Outside, the wind howls through the empty highway.

Title: Old Sheriff
Description: An old sheriff stops by your car. 'Funny how the world changes, huh?' he says.
RightAnswer: Tell him the world’s not changing.

Title: Chance Meeting
Description: The man flips a coin and asks you to call it. 'This coin's been traveling longer than you have,' he says.

Title: Quiet Breakfast
Description: A diner. Morning sun through the window. You drink your coffee and think about nothing at all.

Title: Desert Reflection
Description: The desert stretches endlessly. You realize some roads never lead anywhere, yet you walk them anyway.

Title: President Cancels Meeting for Golf
Description: Breaking News: The President skips a crisis meeting for “important golf diplomacy.”

Title: New Study Finds Sleep Replaces Coffee
Description: Breaking News: Experts shocked to discover eight hours of sleep works better than caffeine.

Title: The Frozen Texan
Description: Breaking News: A man in Texas burns furniture to stay warm. The senator flies to Cancun.

Title: Survey Reveals Confidence
Description: Breaking News: According to a recent survey, 8% of Americans believe they could defeat a lion in a fist fight.

Title: Motorcycle as Bicycle Wins Race
Description: Breaking News: Brave rider identifies motorcycle as bicycle—crushes world record

Title: Retailer Accused of “Tyranny” After New Dress Rule
Description:
A major retailer is facing backlash after requiring customers to wear pants.
Critics say freedom was never meant to be this restrictive.
Shirts remain optional.
Artwork: Retailer Accused of “Tyranny” After New Dress Rule_0
